title: Computer arts typography article
content:
..exactly what it says on the tin... computer arts, having had a \*complete\* make-over (save the body font) has an article on typography, with interviews with emigre, Mike Cina and Identikal. Jason Arber of pixelsurgeon has written the piece.   
   
For all my fellow compatriats, vive la CA.   
   
Matthew   
   
p.s. i need a job
author: matthew_dob

comments.content:
So just to make sure: "Computer Arts" is a paper magazine, right? Which issue, exactly?   
   
hhp

Computer Arts, published by future here ... well its made out of paper so... issue 76 (comes out once a month (roughly)   
   
Matthew
